metadata.synopsis: Chicken/owlbear that they were tormenting during the game is dead. It was a cruel game but the goblin loved it. The goblin was having fun and is bemoaning its death.

0.speaker: Devout Mezzka
0.text: Hah! Guess it was all beak and no bite.
0.context: NodeContext: The player has killed an owlbear cub - a terrifying creature. The goblin was scared of it but is acting braver than he felt to save face,

1.speaker: Devout Mezzka
1.text: Awwww... you burst our chicken! Where we gonna get a new one?
1.context: NodeContext: Chicken that they were tormenting is dead. It was a cruel game but the goblin loved it. Was having fun.
